summary: Completed comprehensive testing of SAE authentication system. All core functionality working correctly including JWT authentication, user registration, login, dashboard access, and external redirects.

fixed_bugs.issue: Invalid token handling caused 500 error instead of 401
fixed_bugs.fix_applied: Changed jwt.JWTError to jwt.InvalidTokenError in server.py

ui_bugs.issue: Error message for invalid login not displayed to user (only in console)

passed_tests: Valid user login with JWT token generation
Registration page navigation and form submission
Login form submission and dashboard redirect
Biometric redirect button present and clickable
Google Sheets redirect button present and clickable
Logout functionality and redirect to login
Google Sheets redirect opens correct URL
action_item_for_main_agent: Minor UI improvement needed: Add toast/error message display for invalid login attempts in LoginPage component. Currently errors are logged to console but not shown to users.
